	public static String getGoal(String[]fileContents){
			String goal = JOptionPane.showInputDialog("Enter a four letter goal word");
			if(goal == null){
					System.exit(0);
				} // if
			
			goal = goal.toLowerCase();
			
			int x = 0;
			
			// check if valid
			while(!fileContents[0].contains(goal) || goal.length() (less than) 4 || goal.length() (greater than) 4){
				x++;
				goal = JOptionPane.showInputDialog("(" + x + ") invalid enteries.\n" + goal + " is not in the dictionary, or is not four letters long. \n Enter anoter staring word: ");
				if(goal == null){
					System.exit(0);
				} // if
				
				goal = goal.toLowerCase();
				
			}
			System.out.println("Goal word is: " + goal);
			return goal;
		} // getGoal
